Name: Indimenticabili Momenti (Unforgettable Moments)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Slightly sweet with vanilla, cherry and cinnamon, along with complex peppermint and herbal notes from Strega interlaced with cognac.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Renato Pinfildi at presso Bottiglieria, Italy.
Nutrition: One serving of Indimenticabili Momenti (Unforgettable Moments) contains 188 calories
